FuncDef:
The pki crl check enable command enables the CRL check function.
The undo pki crl check enable command disables the CRL check function.
By default, the CRL check function is enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before using the CRL function, you must enable the CRL check function.
If certificate authentication is configured using the authentication-method command, disable CRL check. Otherwise, SAs fail to be created.
If certificate authentication is configured using the authentication-method command, disable CRL check. Otherwise, SAs fail to be created.
